video_prompt: Woman's fingers gracefully move across sparkling crystalline piano keys. Her feathered dress subtly shifts. Gentle ocean waves wash ashore as the sunset sky gradually transitions colors. Soft, out-of-focus lights subtly twinkle across the scene.
image_prompt: A white-haired woman in a feathery white gown plays a glowing crystal piano on a serene beach at sunset. Focus on the sparkling details of the piano and serene, magical ambiance.
refined_video_prompt: A woman's fingers gracefully move across piano keys. Her feathered dress subtly shifts. Gentle ocean waves wash ashore as the sunset sky gradually transitions colors. Soft, out-of-focus lights subtly twinkle across the scene.
